marklogic.body: I also worked with bill at anna jaques for several years. I would give him a ride home evry morning often stopping at dunkin donuts so he could get a tea and spend time talking about his family whom he loved very much. Bill was a gentle soul and one of the few gentlemen left in this world he would open a door for a lady or clean my car in the Cold weather. We spent countless hours talking about elvis and even wanting to plan a trip to graceland. He was a true friend whom i will miss. Bill I know your with grammy now and I know she is proud of all you accomplished in your life as we all are. You will truely be missed by all those you held dear to your heart. May you rest in peace and enjoy Gods loving spirit. My prayers go out to your mom and all those who mourn for you. LOVE ALWAYS your friend Lisa Simpson and Family
